name: Get Lucky! (a joke game)
description:
Get lucky is a joke game coding in scratch

I made all the assets by myself made this game at night and it was pretty fun

Source: https://github.com/SnowyDoseGitHub/OpenGetLucky/tree/main

How to play:

The numbers are randomized from 1 to 9 (Easy mode)

Click the card and try to  get lucky!

Press C to cheat  (see what number the win is on)
